headline: HPE and 2degrees Collaborate to Accelerate AI Innovation and Strengthen Data Sovereignty in New Zealand
summary: AUCKLAND, New Zealand, January 26, 2026--HPE (NYSE: HPE) today announced a strategic collaboration with 2degrees, one of New Zealand’s leading telecommunications and technology providers, to fast-track AI-driven innovation by developing a purpose-built private AI platform built on HPE Private Cloud AI. The new solution modernizes and simplifies 2degrees’ technology environment – building a sovereign, unified, and flexible platform that empowers 2degrees to deliver more agile and scalable solutio

headline: Microsoft Stock Before Q2 Earnings: Buy Now or Wait for Results?
summary: MSFT heads into fiscal Q2 with accelerating Azure and Copilot adoption, Ignite 2025 AI launches, and a premium valuation, testing whether results can impress.
